body_html: I wasn't aware this was a common use case. If you would like to add it, you'll need to add support for it to AutogradRNN as well, because we require them to be fully equivalent (so that you can run your RNNs without cudnn or on cpu). Other than that, it sounds good to me.
body_text: I wasn't aware this was a common use case. If you would like to add it, you'll need to add support for it to AutogradRNN as well, because we require them to be fully equivalent (so that you can run your RNNs without cudnn or on cpu). Other than that, it sounds good to me.
body: I wasn't aware this was a common use case. If you would like to add it, you'll need to add support for it to AutogradRNN as well, because we require them to be fully equivalent (so that you can run your RNNs without cudnn or on cpu). Other than that, it sounds good to me.
